ImBridge Home Gallery Settings In settings Turn on the display Brightness watch everything Change the drawing Device name Add a new device Connect by QR code Connect manually Manual connection The device code must contain exactly 4 characters The code is located on the cover of the device Enter the code Connect Connection Connection to is underway Connection Select a Wi-Fi network Password The password is too long. The maximum length is 63 characters The minimum password length is 8 characters Name Device name You can come up with a name for your device or leave the field empty - the default name is G8VG The name cannot be longer than 20 characters Apply Network connection There is no access to the location Update 5G, not supported by the matrix No WiFi network was found, a search is underway Location access is required. Please make sure that it exists Cancel To view the list of WiFi networks, you need access to accurate geolocation Access permission
